Articles.Content:
A little bit. Building things is very time consuming!

The user below me speaks fluent Australian.

No.

The user below me understands that my avatar is a regulus regulus.

False!

The user below me knows Latin

Not much.

The user below me was there when the Big Three were still open.

Alse-fay. (Edit: Ninja'd) I was registered but not really active on the forums at the time.

The user below me shaved today.

False. Yesterday... 8-x

The user below me doesn't speak fluent Aymaran.
True, the user below me knows where the holy booster is located.

False...

The user below me has not seen anything related to my account.

(Not including this post)

True, no idea who you are.

The person below me has logged several hundred hours into Fallout

What is fallout? Definitely false...

The person below me likes wolves.

Not really.

The person below me has eaten lunch today.

nope. I work thirdshift, and after my cereal this morning I went to bed and only just got up.

The person below me is wearing a primary color.

Yep.

The user below me wonders what is in my "Caption the Picture" thread.

Nah, I just posted in it .

The user below me is Illuminati.

No.

The user below me is alive.

Yesh.

The user below me is blue and is lieked.

Well, that depends on how you define "like".

The user below me has watched Frozen.

No kidding!

The user below me has seen me on the forums before somewhere.

Many times, my kids love it. (I actually enjoyed it the first couple of times but it got old with repetition.) Ninja'd

Yes, I've seen you around.

The user below me owns a pair of steel-toed boots.

Nope: I prefer flexibility over durability.

The user below me thinks the Mariokart 8 DLC tracks are beautiful.

Mariowhat?

I've never played any mario games..... please don't hurt me!

The user below me is hyped for ERB Season 4 Zeus vs THOR.

Nope. I have no idea what they are.

The user below me has seen one of my Imgur albums. (if not you should check one out! They are cool)

Nope.

The user below me plays KSP. (I would hope so, since this is a KSP forum!)

ERB is the greatest thing on YouTube, so yes I am excited. Ninja'd

I've played KSP a few times.

The user below me has never started a thread here.

Nope.

Also, I can feel the smugness through the internet from that post.

The user below me is going to see the new Hobbit Movie.
